name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Jiten Flow | Japanese passive study tool

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Jiten Flow replaces selected words and phrases on websites with their Japanese equivalents, creating a unique learning experience.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Immerse yourself in the Japanese language without altering your daily internet habits. Jiten Flow is extension automatically replaces select words and phrases on the websites you visit with their Japanese equivalents, turning every browsing session into a unique learning opportunity. 

Please, visit https://jiten.pro. Sign up is required.

Interactive Elements: Hover over any translated word to see its pronunciation and meaning in English, aiding in understanding and memorization.

Engage with Content You Love: Learn Japanese while reading about your favorite topics. Thereâ€™s no need to switch between learning apps and your daily reads.

Effortless Learning: Absorb Japanese passively without the need for dedicated study time. Perfect for busy individuals who want to learn on the go.
